channel.title: experimental Qubes-Whonix 13 in Qubes R3 RC1 - please test
channel.description:
I installed Qubes 4 because 3 had some issues on my system, 4 seems to run a lot better, so I'd like to avoid having to install Qubes 3.2. Qubes 4 doesn't seem to come with a whonix template installed by default, so I used the command I found on the Qubes website to install Whonix, but it can't seem to find the packages. Before saying that it gives the error
Failed to synchronize cache for repo 'qubes-templates-community', disabling. so I think that's the problem.

item.title: experimental Qubes-Whonix 13 in Qubes R3 RC1 - please test

item.description:

(Link: experimental Qubes-Whonix 13 in Qubes R3 RC1 - please test)

item.source: experimental Qubes-Whonix 13 in Qubes R3 RC1 - please test

item.title: experimental Qubes-Whonix 13 in Qubes R3 RC1 - please test
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
There are quite some bugs we need to work around.

github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues

Issue: key import failed with qubes-release-4.0-0.2.noarch

opened by cartman4 on 2017-09-15 
Qubes OS version (e.g., R3.2):
R4.0-RC-1
Affected TemplateVMs (e.g., fedora-23, if applicable):
dom0
Expected behavior:
install qubes-release-4.0-0.2.noarch and import RPM-GPG-KEY-qubes* for installing whonix-*
Actual behavior:
when updating to...
C: Whonix bug

github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues

Issue: reinstall template documentation: recommend qubesctl state.highstate

opened by adrelanos on 2016-07-07 
https://www.qubes-os.org/doc/reinstall-template/ - Please consider adding the following.
sudo qubesctl state.highstate
That would invoke salt.
https://www.qubes-os.org/doc/salt/
And thereby in case of Whonix (which is currently used...
C: doc C: mgmt enhancement

github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues

Issue: Salt - Qubes R4 RC1 - fails to set sys-whonix's NetVM to default (sys-firewall)

opened by adrelanos on 2017-10-19
closed by marmarek on 2017-10-20 
Salt - Qubes R4 RC1 - fails to set sys-whonix's NetVM to default (sys-firewall)
Qubes OS version:
Qubes R4 with all Qubes testing...
C: Whonix C: mgmt bug r4.0-dom0-stable

github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues

Issue: default_fw_netvm - wrong default value (set to None) (should be set to sys-net) (was: qubes-vm-settings settings bug - failed to change NetVM of sys-whonix)

opened by adrelanos on 2017-10-19
closed by marmarek on 2017-10-20 
failed to change NetVM of sys-whonix using qubes-vm-settings
Qubes OS version:
Qubes R4 with all Qubes testing repositories
Affected TemplateVMs:
Dom0
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Install...
C: core bug r4.0-dom0-stable

Read full topic
item.source: experimental Qubes-Whonix 13 in Qubes R3 RC1 - please test

item.title: experimental Qubes-Whonix 13 in Qubes R3 RC1 - please test
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
sudo rpm --import /etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-qubes-4.0-templates-community
sudo qubes-dom0-update --enablerepo=qubes-templates-community qubes-template-whonix-gw qubes-template-whonix-ws
sudo qubesctl state.sls qvm.sys-whonix
sudo qubesctl state.sls qvm.anon-whonix
sudo qubesctl state.highstate
qvm-prefs --set sys-whonix netvm sys-firewall

Read full topic
